title: Import from file RDCMan.rdg error while importing the file
author: amousa1968
body_snippet:
Hello,

I am using the latest software version 1.75.7011.349 stable and trying to import RDCMan Remote Desktop Connection Manager failed while importing with an error ΓÇ£An error occurred while importing the file, 
I thought this was fixed before.

comments.snippet: Is this a RDCMan v2.7 file? If so, support for importing that version will be added in our v1.76 release that is currently in alpha
comments.author: sparerd

comments.snippet:
Hi David,

Yes it is RDCMan version 2.7.   ThatΓÇÖs correct.  Would you like for me to test your alpha version?  

Thanks 
Ayman Mousa

comments.snippet: Please fix the installer msi for the latest alpha build 25712
comments.author: amousa1968

comments.snippet:
If you would like to bypass the install prerequisite check, you can run the msi from the command line like so:
`msiexec /i C:\Path\To\mRemoteNG-Installer.msi IGNOREPREREQUISITES=1`

More details here: https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/wiki/Installing
comments.author: sparerd

comments.snippet:

Thanks 
Ayman Mousa

comments.author: amousa1968

comments.snippet:
@amousa1968 We have minimal logging on by default. All our builds are "release" builds which don't include any debug information within the binaries.

Please provide the log so we can review further:
https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/wiki/Troubleshooting-and-Logging

You'll need to attach it directly to github - or CC: support@mremoteng.org in your reply.

Please also take some screen shots of your connection list - you can edit out the hostnames/etc - just want to get an idea of you...
comments.author: kmscode

comments.snippet: I am having this very issue with the msi install on windows 10 with all prerequisites installed and on the check page all are green but I can't import rdg files I have tried everything I can think of to get his to work
comments.author: subzerologic

comments.snippet: Hi @kmscode sorry for the delay getting back to you.  This is not in issue any more. I was window system issue after a new window the installer worked just fine.
comments.author: amousa1968

comments.snippet: Hi @subzerologic drag and drop doesn't work, you will have to use import rdcman file into mremoteng. Use File/import/import from a file/look for Remote Desktop Connection Manager extension *.rdg this should do it.....
comments.author: amousa1968

comments.snippet:
i was not draging and dropping the issue was the saved password in the .rdg
file deleted that and it imported just fine. Weird part is it imported
other passwords saved into the file fine fyi

comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.
comments.author: robertpopa22
